actions.name: Energy Veins
actions.description:
Trigger: The Round starts.

Effect: The user chooses any available Type of their choosing (except Typeless) for the rest of the round. The user deals 50% more damage with attacks of the chosen Type and gains Immunity to the chosen Type.

system.description:
Trigger: The Round starts.

Effect: The user chooses any available Type of their choosing (except Typeless) for the rest of the round. The user deals 50% more damage with attacks of the chosen Type and gains Immunity to the chosen Type.
